level.text: There is established a Board of Podiatry to consist of 3 members appointed by the Mayor.
The Board shall regulate the practice of podiatry.
Of the members of the Board, 2 shall be podiatrists licensed in the District and 1 shall be a consumer member.
Except as provided in subsection (e) of this section, members of the Board shall be appointed for terms of 3 years.
Of the members initially appointed under this section, 1 shall be appointed for a term of 1 year, 1 shall be appointed for a term of 2 years, and 1 shall be appointed for a term of 3 years.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 1-523.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-99
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-99, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 3-1201.01.
